title: Eduranna
description: The ziggurat of the god Šamaš at Larsa. The Sumerian ceremonial name Eduranna means "House, Bond of Heaven."

properties.description: The estimated coordinates provided are based on comparing Google/Bing satellite imagery showing the scant visible traces of Ebabbar and Eduranna to detailed excavation plans of the city Larsa (see, e.g., RLAss 6 501).
properties.title: Representative location after excavation plans
